title: Java Modernizes: New Tools for AI and Quantum Age
author: Chris J Preimesberger
description: Oracle's latest Java update delivers AI acceleration, post-quantum security, and streamlined development features while retiring unsafe legacy components.
cntitle: Java 的现代化：AI 和量子时代的新工具
cndescription: Oracle 最新的 Java 更新提供了 AI 加速、后量子安全和简化的开发功能，同时淘汰了不安全的旧组件。
